name: ChildRaise Trust

address: Mogal Lane, Near Ganga Vihar Hotel, Mahim

briefDescription: ChildRaise Trust is committed to the empowerment of Special Needs Children and Disability Issues.RAISE stands for Rehabilitation, Awareness, Information, Support and Education.ChildRaise Trust provides multi-layered support such as : 1)Internet based service- www.childraise.com. This is a cross-disability web-portal which provides basic information about various disabilities, all the special services like special schools, sheltered workshops, support groups and current disability related events.2)Print support-ChildRaise has published a Resource Guide-Journey to Empowerment : a road map for special needs children. This book is like a directory for parents, professionals working in the field of disability. Other information material is al
